title: Infinadeck Experience Platform Software Plugin
description: 1:1 True Natural Locomotion in Any Desktop VR App
longDescription:
PROJECT MUST BE A C++ PROJECT, OR ELSE API CALLS WILL NOT WORK.


Use this plugin in any desktop virtual reality project to translate outputs from the Infinadeck App to enable true 1:1 motion in your virtual reality project today!


This plugin was designed for use by anyone with access to an Infinadeck omnidirectional treadmill, or anyone who wants to create VR apps designed with Infinadeck Experience Platform™ software in mind.


Lightweight but feature-full, this simple-to-setup plugin should provide developers all of the tools they could possibly need to make a high-quality, Infinadeck-ready experience today.


Go to our GitHub for the latest documentation, user guides, and older plugin versions (we currently support UE4.25, UE4.26, UE4.27, and all versions of UE5).


If you need to use an older version of Unreal Engine (4.25 and newer), please see our GitHub to
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  InfinadeckCore: Loads and unloads other modules as necessary, to keep performance in the project as lightweight as possible.
  •  InfinadeckLocomotion: Provides the 1:1 motion mapping to your project, allowing for a no-hassle configuration-free translation between treadmill motion and in-game motion.
  •  InfinadeckReferenceObjects: Allows you to see the treadmill in VR in real time, along with providing important grounding elements for maximum comfort in the VR space.
  • InfinadeckSplashscreen: Shows developers and players that their treadmill is working, allowing them to better verify their setup.
  • User adjustable parameters are stored in two settings files:
  • [User Directory]/Documents/My Games/Infinadeck/Config/keybinds.ini
  • [User Directory]/Documents/My Games/Infinadeck/Config/settings.ini

Code Modules:

  •  InfinadeckSDK: Exposes InfinadeckAPI functions to blueprints, and basic INI file I/O

Number of Blueprints: 6

Number of C++ Classes: 1

Network Replicated: Yes (see documentation)

Supported Development Platforms: Windows 64-bit

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows 64-bit

Documentation: https://github.com/Infinadeck/InfinadeckUnrealPlugin

Example Video: https://youtu.be/Dapf3qnf06g

Example Project: https://bit.ly/3nuSM8T

Important/Additional Notes: Please visit https://github.com/Infinadeck/InfinadeckSDK for access to the Infinadeck App
